import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart"; import Drawer from "@mui/material/Drawer"; import List from "@mui/material/List"; import ListItem from "@mui/material/ListItem"; import { useAuth } from "../context/auth"; import { useCart } from "../context/cart"; const carts = [ { id: 1, name: "Throwback Hip Bag", href: "#", color: "Salmon", price: "$90.00", quantity: 1, imageSrc: "https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/shopping-cart-page-04-cart-01.jpg", imageAlt: "Salmon orange fabric pouch with match zipper, gray zipper pull, and adjustable hip belt.", }, { id: 2, name: "Medium Stuff Satchel", href: "#", color: "Blue", price: "$32.00", quantity: 1, imageSrc: "https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/shopping-cart-page-04-cart-02.jpg", imageAlt: "Front of satchel with blue canvas body, black straps and handle, drawstring top, and front zipper pouch.", }, ]; const Cart = () => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const [cart, setCart] = useCart(); const [openDrawer, setOpenDrawer] = useState(false); const handleToggleDrawer = () => { setOpenDrawer(!openDrawer); }; return ( <>

  • {cart.name}

    {cart.price.toLocaleString("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "INR", })}

    {cart.color}

    Qty {cart.quantity}

    • ))}

); }; export default Cart;
